channel.title: [PI] Need help With Pre-Load
channel.description:
Alright So i added new models (chaotic models) but there invisible so i was told to preload and it is just where you go into client.java remove the // from [code]preloadModels();[/code]
but when i compile and load up the client i get some error untill i add the it again [code]// preloadModels()[/code]
and my chaotic long sword is still invisble.
and when i try to do the ::add model command it doesnt work
any help would be appreciated i have been trying to add models for an while now. i had been looking for a few hours and still nothing . here are some pictures so you can try to understand i really want this fixed :( . I also got told to Cache pack but i dont know how to do that if you can give me a link to try to that ill be happy.
[url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2593689/pic_1.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2593689/pic_1.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2593692/pic_2.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2593692/pic_2.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2593695/pic_3.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2593695/pic_3.jpg[/img][/url]

item.title: [PI] Need help With Pre-Load
item.dc:creator: @killag123 killag123
item.description:
@killag123 wrote:

Alright So i added new models (chaotic models) but there invisible so i was told to preload and it is just where you go into client.java remove the // from preloadModels();

but when i compile and load up the client i get some error untill i add the it again // preloadModels()

and my chaotic long sword is still invisble.

and when i try to do the ::add model command it doesnt work

any help would be appreciated i have been trying to add models for an while now. i had been looking for a few hours and still nothing . here are some pictures so you can try to understand i really want this fixed . I also got told to Cache pack but i dont know how to do that if you can give me a link to try to that ill be happy.
